eventDecorators.name: Deposit
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

eventDecorators.name: DepositRewards
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

eventDecorators.name: EmergencyRewardWithdraw
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

eventDecorators.name: EmergencyWithdraw
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

eventDecorators.name: Paused
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

eventDecorators.name: SkimStakeTokenFees
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

eventDecorators.name: Withdraw

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Deposit staking token into the contract to earn rewards. Since this contract needs to be supplied with rewards we are sending the balance of the contract if the pending rewards are higher.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of staking tokens to deposit.

functionDecorators.name: getStakeTokenFeeBalance
functionDecorators.description: Obtain the stake token fees (if any) earned by reflect token.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: paused
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: rewardBalance
functionDecorators.description: Obtain the reward balance of this contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _bonusEndTimestamp
parameterDecorators.description: The block when rewards will end.

functionDecorators.name: setPaused
functionDecorators.description: enables owner to pause / unpause minting.

parameterDecorators.name: _rewardPerSecond
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of reward tokens to be given per block.

functionDecorators.name: skimStakeTokenFees
functionDecorators.description: Remove excess stake tokens earned by reflect fees.

functionDecorators.name: totalStakeTokenBalance
functionDecorators.description: Obtain the stake balance of this contract.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw rewards and/or staked tokens. Pass a 0 amount to withdraw only rewards.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of staking tokens to withdraw.
